_header: The foremost Father that formed you all
Versification: — irregular, alliterative, four-line, six-line — abab, aabccb
_description: Dialogue between Lucidus and Dubius — 612 lines in varying rhyming patterns

Winches33.First Lines:
The formyst fadere þat formed ȝou allethe wytt &
                    þe wysdom of his sone dere…
Winches33.Last Lines:
…he may asoyle by þe office of þe chercheAnd criste
                    hym soyleth and nat he
Winches33.Note:
Ends with Latin translation of last lines, Non enim ipse Christus per
                        eorum officium ligat et soluit / Hec Lucidarius siue Lumen Laycorum (f.
                        64v).
